name: Basic Analysis Workflow (v3.0 Enhanced)
description: Performs a web search based on a user query, summarizes the results using an LLM (considering search confidence), and displays a formatted summary including IAR status.

inputs.content: Starting Basic Analysis for query: {{ initial_context.user_query }}

perform_search.description: Perform web search using the user query.

summarize_results.description: Summarize search results using LLM, noting search confidence.

display_summary.description: Format and display the final summary including IAR status.

inputs.code:
import json
import sys

input_json_str = sys.stdin.read()
context_data = json.loads(input_json_str)

search_status = context_data.get('search_status', 'N/A')
search_conf = context_data.get('search_conf', 'N/A')
summary_status = context_data.get('summary_status', 'N/A')
summary_conf = context_data.get('summary_conf', 'N/A')
summary_text = context_data.get('summary_text', 'Summary generation failed or skipped.')
user_query = context_data.get('user_query', 'N/A')

output = f"--- Analysis Summary (ResonantiA v3.0) ---\nUser Query: {user_query}\n\nSearch Status: {search_status} (Confidence: {search_conf})\nSummary Status: {summary_status} (Confidence: {summary_conf})\n\nSummary:\n{summary_text}\n---------------------------------------"

print(output)
result = {'formatted_summary': output}
inputs.input_data:
{
  "search_status": "{{ perform_search.reflection.status | default('N/A') }}",
  "search_conf": "{{ perform_search.reflection.confidence | default('N/A') }}",
  "summary_status": "{{ summarize_results.reflection.status | default('N/A') }}",
  "summary_conf": "{{ summarize_results.reflection.confidence | default('N/A') }}",
  "summary_text": "{{ summarize_results.response_text | default('Summary generation failed or skipped.') |replace('"', '\"') |replace('\n', '\\n') }}",
  "user_query": "{{ initial_context.user_query | default('N/A') |replace('"', '\"') |replace('\n', '\\n') }}"
}
